locutie.beschrijving: A contrast between Margaret Mead's anthropological optimism and Paul's hamartiology. The sermon explains the 'iron rule' of Sin/Death and the 'much more' of Christ's righteousness.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High; utilizes Käsemann and Cranmer to frame the cosmic nature of Sin as a power rather than just individual acts.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting the reality of the human condition (Adam) and promising the victory of Christ (New Adam).
voorbeelden: I am among you as a fellow prisoner who brings news of impending release.
This is the story that the children must hear from the elders.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Disillusionment with secular progress; comfort in the objective victory of Christ; sense of duty to pass on the faith.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit; the sermon relies on the 'news' itself to effect change, but lacks explicit invocation of the Spirit's power.

voorbeelden: Mead speaks of prefigurative and postfigurative cultures.
Sin came into the world through one man.
The axis of evil has gained dominion everywhere.
Now listen to the way that Paul has taken those statements.
One generation shall praise thy works.
I hope with all my heart that you can see...
We found Mead’s views... to be tremendously exciting.
This promise of a completely remade future that is the gift of God.
Grace also might reign... to eternal life.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strongly grounded in the text of Romans, though often phrased as 'news about' rather than 'I promise you'.

voorbeelden: I am among you as a fellow prisoner who brings news of impending release.
declaratieven.autoriteit: The preacher acts as a 'messenger' (heraldic authority) rather than a 'priest' (sacramental authority).

indicatoren: Extensive cultural analysis of Margaret Mead (first 6 paragraphs).
Detailed explanation of Paul's logic ('Paul assumes...', 'Paul hammers away...').
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is well-informed about the 'Adam' situation but remains an observer of the 'Christ' solution until the very end.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the promise to the specific 'you' of the congregation earlier in the text.
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Intellectual agreement without immediate existential encounter.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High theological quality, but late in the delivery.
voorbeelden: Grace also might reign through [God’s] righteousness to eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal anecdote and pastoral identification ('I am among you').

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Limited; mostly used to challenge the hearer's assumptions about the world.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Dominant; discussing Mead, Paul, Adam, and 'the young people'.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Mead's book, the 1960s, and the Genesis narrative.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological truths about Sin and Death.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon avoids moralism; it does not move from 'Sin' to 'Try harder'.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from Assertive (The human condition) to Commissive (The news of release).
voorbeelden: We are trapped... But there is news today.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Theologically sound but rhetorically delayed by the long constative introduction.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Because grace abounded... one generation shall praise thy works.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon is a powerful 'report' of the Gospel. It functions as a herald bringing news from a far country, which is performative, but it spends a vast amount of time describing the 'geography' of the old country first.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The axis of evil has gained dominion everywhere, in every human heart.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The first 6 paragraphs regarding Margaret Mead.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The 'event' happens in the final third when the preacher identifies as a fellow prisoner bringing news.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: Stronger in 'telling about' the sacrament of the Word than 'being' the sacrament of the Word.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Implicit; the preacher 'brings news' of what God has said.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Yes; 'I have only this one passage to leave with you'.
tekstueel_bewijs: I am among you as a fellow prisoner who brings news.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, the 'story' is treated as the means of remaking life.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Moderate; becomes epiphanic in the conclusion.
tekstueel_bewijs: It is in his story that all our stories are remade.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is heavy on past-tense and third-person verbs. It needs more present-tense, second-person performatives.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: One man’s act of righteousness leads to acquittal and life for all men.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Because of Christ's act of righteousness, I declare to you today: you are acquitted, and you have life.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from a general truth (Assertive) to a specific event (Declarative).

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is framed as 'news about' rather than 'address to'.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Use 'You' more frequently in the Romans 5 section.
voorbeeldzinnen: Christ promises you today that the iron rule of death is broken in your life.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: Too much 'we' and 'they' (the young), not enough 'you'.
adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Address the congregation directly as the subjects of the 'impending release'.
voorbeeldzinnen: You are the ones being released.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A theoretically robust and theologically deep sermon that successfully avoids moralism, though it risks becoming a lecture in its first half.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT reveals that the preacher isn't just 'sending a message' about sin, but attempting to 'enact' a release from it.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The power is not in the Mead anecdote (rhetoric), but in the illocutionary force of the 'News' (Gospel).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT identifies that the 'news of release' is the only truly performative moment that changes the hearer's status.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: I am among you as a fellow prisoner who brings news of impending release.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Heraldic Preaching'.
